text.div:
map "http://termx.health/fhir/StructureMap/tobacco-use-to-fhir" = ""

uses "http://example.org/StructureDefinition/TobaccoUseModel" alias TobaccoUseModel as source
uses "http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Observation" alias Observation as target

group tutorial(source src : TobaccoUseModel, target obs : Observation) {
  src -> obs.id = uuid() "rule_id";
  src -> obs.status = 'final' "rule_status";
  src -> obs.category = cc('http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/observation-category', 'vital-signs', 'Vital Signs') "rule_category";
  src -> obs.code = cc('http://snomed.info/sct', '229819007', 'Tobacco use and exposure') "rule_code";
  // src.tulemus as val -> obs.valueCodeableConcept = cc('http://snomed.info/sct', val) "rule_value";
  src -> obs.value = create('CodeableConcept') as newCC then {
    src -> newCC.coding = create('Coding') as newCoding then {
      src -> newCoding.system = 'http://snomed.info/sct' "rule-value-coding-system";
      src.tulemus as val -> newCoding.code = val "rule-value-coding-code";
    } "rule-value-coding";
  } "rule-value";
  src.aeg as aeg -> obs.effective = aeg "rule_effectiveTime";
  src.kommentaar as kom -> obs.note = create('Annotation') as note then {
    kom -> note.text = kom "rule_note_text";
  } "rule_note";
  src.patsient as pat -> obs.subject = create('Reference') as subjectRef then {
    pat ->  subjectRef.type = 'Patient',  subjectRef.reference = append('Patient?identifier=', pat) "rule-subref-1";
  } "rule-subject";
  src.labiviija as doc -> obs.performer = create('Reference') as docRef then {
    doc ->  docRef.type = 'Practitioner',  docRef.reference = append('Practitioner?identifier=', doc) "rule-docref-1";
  } "rule-performer";
}
